channel.title: Just a simple question
channel.description: Mopar, do you think at anytime you could change what that box says...like all the stuff about we will miss kaitnieks? I mean i'm sure we will all miss kaitnieks, but i think that should have like really important news about the community in there....just a suggestion, doesn't really make a difference either way.

item.title: Just a simple question
item.dc:creator: @bumr055 bumr055
item.description:
@bumr055 wrote:

[quote=“Ange1, post:3, topic:5240”][quote author=poopy4231 link=topic=6880.msg70521#msg70521 date=1153197071]
I say pirates of the carribean movie was awsome!
[/quote]
It wasn’t that good… but it was better than the first…
…
…
No comment[/quote]
are you mad? it just ended and there was no point to the hole thing after that(it was just basicly a pre. for number three.

and yah they should put some more importent “stuff” in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a simple question
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

I actually like that suggestion! Ya, we could have a news box at the main page like on Kaitnieks? Seems usefull to me, but shouldn’t this be in General Site dsicussions?
